name: Ochsner Health - Psychiatry & Behavioral Health Services
address: Multiple locations across Louisiana, including New Orleans, Baton Rouge, Lafayette, Metairie, Laplace, Luling, Chalmette, Houma, Shreveport, Covington, Mandeville, Raceland, and Morgan City
phone: Varies by location. For example, Ochsner Medical Center - New Orleans can be reached at (504) 842-3000

name: Regions Behavioral Health Hospital

description: Offers inpatient and outpatient mental health services with individual and group treatment programs for adolescents, adults, and seniors

description: Provides adult mental health services, addictive disorder services, and services for children and adolescents
